name: Stampaholic
description:
Story: You are a busy worker and you need to stamp the books!

Instructions:

Press the UP and DOWN arrow key to move

'A' shoots a red stamp

'D' shoots a green stamp

Hit papers with the same color stamp to survive!

Credits:

Game by Trudger https://twitter.com/L08480154

Music By Lute https://twitter.com/surri01
